review: The fire stick does everything as advertised, which by itself is incredibly impressive, but add that value at the low cost and it is amazing. To be fair, we only use this in a seldom used guest room, and have similar features of the fire stick embedded in our main TVs via either a Blue Ray player, PS3 and even to some degree in our smart TV, but in the guest room we wanted simple with no additional wires. And there's the kicker. No additional wires dropped this little device to 4 stars versus 5 because what I didn't know was that the stick does not pull power from the TV like a USB might. So, I have a beautifully simplistic TV hung on a wall over a fireplace, and an ugly little micro-usb power cable from the stick to the nearest outlet. (The cable was not long enough to run through the wall like the tv power)
